July 16, 1870 D Hollingworth Lake Contest
Rochdale Contest (1800s) 0 Test Piece Contest
rochdale-contest-1800s
Set Test and Own Choice
Nabucodonosor - Overture [unknown arranger]
Hollingworth Lake, Rochdale Source: The Preston Guardian etc (Preston, England), Saturday, July 23, 1870; Issue 3081.
IBEW lists Briercliffe as the winners, but this seems to be an error.
Briercliffe played "Hallelujah Chorus", "Kyrie", and "Gloria." Five prizes, amounting to Â£74 12 bands competed.
